name: BigAR - YGO Card Scanner
description:
BigAR - YGO Card Scanner is an app for Yu-Gi-Oh!™ TCG players - It provides easy access to card image and price from MagicCardMarket.eu or TCGPlayer.com of every Yu-Gi-Oh!™ card just by scanning them.

Now also featuring deck creation, with side and extra deck, and export options. We're working on a collection manager, and the ability to create multiple decks.

Prices and images are provided by MagicCardMarket.eu or TCGPlayer.com

Yu-Gi-Oh! card images and character names are trademarks of Konami. All rights reserved. This app is unaffiliated.

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BigAR.YGO/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/bigaryugioh
